build.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev --prefer-dist --no-interaction --optimize-autoloader && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --no-audit --no-fund && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: php artisan migrate --force && php artisan storage:link || true && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
